Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there seem to be the trolls out in social media saying that we shouldnt have swept the funds. i think it would be very helpful if people here who feel that what we did was the right thing, could post in social media, that will help set the record straight

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if we didnt do what we did, there wouldnt be any claim process, complex or otherwise. just a lot of tears over 9 million KMD missing

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: some trolls are claiming that we hacked the users based on what the news reports say, but really we hacked the hackers data trove
